name: A very bad day
description:
I did this project on my own for the delivery of the third mandatory practice of the video game oriented programming course in Unity.

It is a third person game in which the player will take the role of a woman who has to go to work, but on her way to the office she will find some surprises.

As a feature to highlight is its camera system, which is based on the use of fixed cameras which condition the movement of the character.
